title: Top 7 Crypto Presales VCs Are Closely Watching QUBE, BORROE, Uwerx, Tradecurve, Mooky, Bitcoin Spark, and AiDoge
description: Crypto presales have become a popular method for new DeFi projects to raise funds before the official launch of a token. title: 458 Persons Arrested in Hong Kong Over $60M Crypto-related Scams
description:
The police in Hong Kong have arrested 458 people from 314 cases involving money laundering of almost $60 million. According to reports, about $15 million of the total amount was via cash withdrawals and cryptocurrency transactions.  A recent report showed that the arrested victims were involved in different financial crimes, cutting across online shopping, job […]
